My Projects

Check out some of my projects

React Native App

Key Conservation

Github

The Key Conservation App is used by conservation organizations and their global supporters to raise money real time for campaigns. Organizations also have the ability to list campaigns for supporters to see.

Node Back End

AirBnB Price Navigator

Github

The AirBnB Price Navigator is a website for rental owners that need guidance in pricing a rental property. Users can input information about the property and receive a recommended price value.

React Application

Github-Battle

Github

Github-Battle is an app to see top repos by language and to compare to github users to see who is more popular

React Hooks

Contact Keeper

Github

Contact Keeper is a website for you to keep all of your contacts. It allows you to add and edit contacts.

React Application

Smart Brain

Github

Smart brain is an app that allows you to upload a picture and then use it to detect faces in the pictures that have been uploaded

HTML/CSS

Smith & Jones Architects

Github

This is a website for Smith & Jones Architects that was built for User Interface Project Week
